basics.name: Harshvardhan Joshi
basics.label: Mobile App Developer & Full Stack Developer

summary: Crafting exceptional mobile and web experiences with Flutter, NextJs, and React. Over 8+ years of experience delivering high-quality, performant apps on multiple platforms. Passionate about continuous learning and open source contributions.
headline: Full Stack Developer | Flutter Expert | Active Open Source Contributor

testimonials.name: Donn F.
testimonials.review:
If you're looking for a Flutter dev for a project you're working on, I highly recommend Harshvardhan Joshi 💯.
He did a fantastic job with me on a timer app I recently released in beta (knurlfitness.com). He's very knowledgable about Flutter, he's very responsive, & attentive to detail. I really enjoyed working with him on this project. If you need some Flutter/etc help, hit him up. 🚀

testimonials.name: Kalpesh K.
testimonials.review:
Harshvardhan is the first person I reach out to if I want to have some deep technical discussions, this guy is always up to date with cutting-edge tech. 
His standard of work is so high that it always keeps me inspired. Harsh is definitely the must-have asset especially when the project being built has some deep research involved. 
We have worked for a long time in the same team and I consider myself privileged that I got to work with him, being in the same team made my learning really quick. 
As a leader too Harsh is really good and his juniors have learned a lot from him. I would definitely want to work with him again. Good luck Man, keep rocking!! :)

testimonials.name: Himanshu T.
testimonials.review: Great mentor, has great skill in flutter and was always a go to person in all of my flutter needs. We have completed some awesome challenging task in mobile team together.

testimonials.name: Avinash N.
testimonials.review:
I had the pleasure of working with Harsh on several projects where he excelled as a Mobile Developer. Harsh's expertise in Flutter and mobile app development is exceptional, and his ability to build entire applications from scratch is truly impressive.
Not only is Harsh technically skilled, but he also has a deep understanding of product requirements and user experience. He seamlessly bridges the gap between technical execution and business needs, ensuring that the final product is both robust and user-friendly. His ability to work independently while delivering high-quality solutions makes him a standout professional in the field. 
Harsh is a dedicated and talented individual, and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend him for any challenging mobile development projects. He is an asset to any team!

processes.title: Development
steps: Architecture design and tech stack selection
Agile development with regular sprints and code reviews

processes.title: Launch & Growth
steps: Rolling out crucial updates and hotfixes

experience.summary: Working on my own app, Exch - Currency Converter, as well as enhancing the Fortime Timer app and collaborating on various projects for Imagined Studios as a freelance full-stack developer.
Working on the Solo for Creators Flutter app and revamping the internal recruitment job board using NextJs. Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable solutions.

Led the 'GO Web & Mobile App' project from concept to deployment with a team of 5 full-stack developers. Integrated new features across sub-projects such as the Web App, Mobile App, Onboarding, Digital KYC, and more. Achievements include successful project delivery, team leadership, and driving technical direction with Flutter, React, and NodeJS.

Led all Flutter client projects from concept to deployment, creating scalable Flutter apps and toolkits including QuickStart Flutter Login and E-commerce kits, among others. Key achievements include successful app deployments, enhanced user experience, and mentoring junior developers.

Led the rebranding of the Investar India Mobile App by migrating from a native Android codebase to Flutter, ensuring full feature parity and iOS support. Achievements include successful app rebranding, significant feature enhancements, and process innovations such as developing creative solutions for dynamic widget rendering in Flutter.
